pages.text: O-Chickens drop meat, feathers, and bones. They also come in many different variants, and lay eggs like usual. $(br2)Chickens come in 6 different breeds and lay 3 eggs when bred. $(br)Leghorn (White Eggs), Ameraucana (Teal Eggs), Cream Legbar (Blue Eggs), Marans (Chocolate Brown Eggs), Olive Egger (Olive Eggs), Sussex Silkie (Cream Eggs)

The egg laying cooldown on O-Chickens is 10-15 minutes rather than the vanilla 5-10 minutes. However, this is configurable in the livestock-overhaul-common.toml. $(br)The type of egg laid depends solely on the hen's breed, not the rooster's.
$(l)Fertilized Eggs$() can be thrown to hatch chicks, and are obtained by breeding a Rooster and a Hen.
